description: Clump object representing a rigid aggregate of pebbles (overlapping spheres) in PFC. Clumps model complex particle shapes. Obtained via itasca.clump.find(), itasca.clump.list(), or created with itasca.command('clump generate').
note: Objects of this type should not be created (instantiated) directly in Python. Use module functions that return instances.

methods.name: id
methods.description: Get the clump ID number. Unique identifier for this clump.

methods.name: valid
methods.description: Check if this clump is live (still exists in the model). Returns False if clump has been deleted.

returns.description: True if clump exists, False if deleted

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Delete this clump from the model. All pebbles in the clump are also deleted. References to this object become invalid.

methods.name: pos
methods.description: Get clump centroid location as vector (x, y, z). This is the mass center of the clump.

methods.name: pos_x
methods.description: Get X-component of clump centroid location.

methods.name: pos_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of clump centroid location.

methods.name: pos_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of clump centroid location.

methods.name: set_pos
methods.description: Set clump centroid location. Moves entire clump (all pebbles) to new position. May cause overlaps.

methods.name: set_pos_x
methods.description: Set X-component of clump centroid location.

methods.name: set_pos_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of clump centroid location.

methods.name: set_pos_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of clump centroid location.

methods.name: euler
methods.description: Get clump orientation as Euler angles (vector). Defines rotation from reference configuration.

methods.name: euler_x
methods.description: Get X-component of clump orientation (Euler angle).

methods.name: euler_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of clump orientation (Euler angle).

methods.name: euler_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of clump orientation (Euler angle).

methods.name: set_euler
methods.description: Set clump orientation using Euler angles. Rotates entire clump.

methods.name: set_euler_x
methods.description: Set X-component of clump orientation.

methods.name: set_euler_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of clump orientation.

methods.name: set_euler_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of clump orientation.

methods.name: disp
methods.description: Get clump displacement vector from initial position.

methods.name: disp_x
methods.description: Get X-component of clump displacement.

methods.name: disp_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of clump displacement.

methods.name: disp_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of clump displacement.

methods.name: set_disp
methods.description: Set clump displacement vector.

methods.name: set_disp_x
methods.description: Set X-component of clump displacement.

methods.name: set_disp_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of clump displacement.

methods.name: set_disp_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of clump displacement.

methods.name: vel
methods.description: Get clump velocity vector (vx, vy, vz).

methods.name: vel_x
methods.description: Get X-component of clump velocity.

methods.name: vel_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of clump velocity.

methods.name: vel_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of clump velocity.

methods.name: set_vel
methods.description: Set clump velocity vector.

methods.name: set_vel_x
methods.description: Set X-component of clump velocity.

methods.name: set_vel_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of clump velocity.

methods.name: set_vel_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of clump velocity.

methods.name: spin
methods.description: Get clump angular velocity vector (wx, wy, wz).

methods.name: spin_x
methods.description: Get X-component of clump angular velocity.

methods.name: spin_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of clump angular velocity.

methods.name: spin_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of clump angular velocity.

methods.name: set_spin
methods.description: Set clump angular velocity vector.

methods.name: set_spin_x
methods.description: Set X-component of clump angular velocity.

methods.name: set_spin_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of clump angular velocity.

methods.name: set_spin_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of clump angular velocity.

methods.name: force_app
methods.description: Get clump applied force vector. External force applied to clump.

methods.name: force_app_x
methods.description: Get X-component of applied force

methods.name: force_app_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of applied force

methods.name: force_app_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of applied force

methods.name: set_force_app
methods.description: Set clump applied force vector.

methods.name: set_force_app_x
methods.description: Set X-component of applied force

methods.name: set_force_app_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of applied force

methods.name: set_force_app_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of applied force

methods.name: force_contact
methods.description: Get total contact force on clump. Sum of forces from all contacts.

methods.name: force_contact_x
methods.description: Get X-component of contact force

methods.name: force_contact_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of contact force

methods.name: force_contact_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of contact force

methods.name: set_force_contact
methods.description: Set contact force vector

methods.name: set_force_contact_x
methods.description: Set X-component of contact force

methods.name: set_force_contact_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of contact force

methods.name: set_force_contact_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of contact force

methods.name: force_unbal
methods.description: Get clump unbalanced force. Net force after all forces applied.

methods.name: force_unbal_x
methods.description: Get X-component of unbalanced force

methods.name: force_unbal_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of unbalanced force

methods.name: force_unbal_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of unbalanced force

methods.name: moment_app
methods.description: Get clump applied moment (torque) vector.

methods.name: moment_app_x
methods.description: Get X-component of applied moment

methods.name: moment_app_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of applied moment

methods.name: moment_app_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of applied moment

methods.name: set_moment_app
methods.description: Set clump applied moment vector

methods.name: set_moment_app_x
methods.description: Set X-component of applied moment

methods.name: set_moment_app_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of applied moment

methods.name: set_moment_app_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of applied moment

methods.name: moment_contact
methods.description: Get total contact moment on clump from all contacts.

methods.name: moment_contact_x
methods.description: Get X-component of contact moment

methods.name: moment_contact_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of contact moment

methods.name: moment_contact_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of contact moment

methods.name: set_moment_contact
methods.description: Set contact moment vector

methods.name: set_moment_contact_x
methods.description: Set X-component of contact moment

methods.name: set_moment_contact_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of contact moment

methods.name: set_moment_contact_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of contact moment

methods.name: moment_unbal
methods.description: Get clump unbalanced moment. Net moment after all moments applied.

methods.name: moment_unbal_x
methods.description: Get X-component of unbalanced moment

methods.name: moment_unbal_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of unbalanced moment

methods.name: moment_unbal_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of unbalanced moment

methods.name: mass
methods.description: Get clump inertial mass (used in calculations).

methods.name: mass_real
methods.description: Get clump real (gravitational) mass.

methods.name: density
methods.description: Get clump density.

methods.name: set_density
methods.description: Set clump density. Updates mass automatically unless MOI is fixed.

methods.name: vol
methods.description: Get clump volume. In 2D this is volume per unit thickness.

methods.name: set_vol
methods.description: Set clump volume. In 2D this is volume per unit thickness. Setting volume manually activates MOI fix state.

methods.name: damp
methods.description: Get clump local damping coefficient.

methods.name: set_damp
methods.description: Set clump local damping coefficient.

methods.name: moi
methods.description: Get clump moment of inertia tensor. In 2D returns float (polar moment).

returns.description: Moment of inertia tensor (or float in 2D)

methods.name: moi_real
methods.description: Get clump real moment of inertia. In 2D returns float (polar moment).

returns.description: Real moment of inertia (or float in 2D)

methods.name: set_moi_real
methods.description: Set clump real moment of inertia. Setting manually activates MOI fix state.

methods.name: moi_prin
methods.description: Get clump principal moment of inertia as vector.

methods.name: moi_prin_x
methods.description: Get X-component of principal moment of inertia

methods.name: moi_prin_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of principal moment of inertia

methods.name: moi_prin_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of principal moment of inertia

methods.name: moi_prin_real
methods.description: Get clump real principal moment of inertia.

methods.name: moi_prin_real_x

returns.description: X real principal moment of inertia

methods.description: Get X-component of real principal moment of inertia

methods.name: moi_prin_real_y

returns.description: Y real principal moment of inertia

methods.description: Get Y-component of real principal moment of inertia

methods.name: moi_prin_real_z

returns.description: Z real principal moment of inertia

methods.description: Get Z-component of real principal moment of inertia

methods.name: set_moi_prin_real
methods.description: Set real principal MOI. Other attributes unchanged. Activates MOI fix state.

methods.name: set_moi_prin_real_x
methods.description: Set X-component of real principal MOI. Activates MOI fix state.

methods.name: set_moi_prin_real_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of real principal MOI. Activates MOI fix state.

methods.name: set_moi_prin_real_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of real principal MOI. Activates MOI fix state.

methods.name: moi_fix
methods.description: Get MOI fixity state. When True, MOI not auto-updated on scaling/density changes.

methods.name: set_moi_fix
methods.description: Set MOI fixity state. Controls auto-update behavior.

methods.name: pebbles
methods.description: Get iterator over all pebbles in this clump.

methods.name: add_pebble
methods.signature: clump.add_pebble(pebble_radius: float, pebble_centroid: vec, id: int = None) -> Pebble
methods.description: Add a pebble to this clump. No impact on inertial attributes. Clump no longer refers to template. Pebble must be within domain.

methods.name: delete_pebble
methods.description: Delete a pebble from this clump. No impact on inertial attributes. Clump no longer refers to template.

methods.name: contacts
methods.signature: clump.contacts(piece: object = None, all: bool = False, type: type = None) -> tuple[Contact, ...]
methods.description: Get tuple of contacts associated with this clump. Can filter by piece (Ball/Pebble/Facet), type, and virtual contacts.

parameters.name: piece
parameters.description: Optional Ball, Pebble, or Facet to filter contacts

methods.name: contact_count
methods.signature: clump.contact_count(all: bool = False, type: type = None) -> int
methods.description: Get number of contacts associated with this clump. Can filter by type and include virtual contacts.

methods.name: group
methods.description: Get clump group name in a given slot.

methods.name: groups
methods.description: Get dictionary of all groups this clump belongs to. Keys are slot names, values are group names.

methods.name: in_group
methods.signature: clump.in_group(group_name: str | int, slot: str | int = None) -> bool
methods.description: Test if clump is in a given group. If slot specified, only checks that slot.

methods.name: set_group
methods.signature: clump.set_group(group_name: str | int, slot: str | int = None) -> None
methods.description: Set clump group name in a given slot.

methods.name: group_remove
methods.signature: clump.group_remove(group_name: str | int, slot: str | int = None) -> bool
methods.description: Remove clump from given group in all or specific slot.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Get the template associated with this clump. Returns None if no template.

methods.name: template_euler
methods.description: Get clump template relative orientation (Euler angles).

methods.name: template_euler_x
methods.description: Get X-component of template orientation

methods.name: template_euler_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of template orientation

methods.name: template_euler_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of template orientation

methods.name: template_scale
methods.description: Get clump template relative scaling factor.

methods.name: calculate
methods.description: Calculate clump inertial properties using voxelation approach. Error should be in range 0.0005 < x < 1. Pebbles not translated but centroid may move. MOI will update unless fixed.

methods.name: rotate
methods.description: Rotate clump about given axis (right-handed) by angle in degrees. Rotation point is clump position.

methods.name: scale_sphere
methods.description: Scale clump to equivalent sphere. Clump scaled so its volume equals sphere of given diameter. Pebbles scaled and repositioned. All must remain in domain. MOI updates unless fixed.

methods.name: scale_vol
methods.description: Scale clump to specified volume. Pebbles scaled and repositioned. All must remain in domain. MOI updates unless fixed.

methods.name: to_global
methods.description: Rotate vector from principal (local) coordinate system to global system.

methods.name: to_prin
methods.description: Rotate vector from global coordinate system to principal (local) system.

methods.name: fix
methods.description: Get clump fixity condition for DOF. 3D: 0-2=xyz velocity, 3-5=xyz angular velocity. 2D: 0-1=xy velocity, 2=angular velocity.

methods.name: set_fix
methods.description: Set clump fixity condition for DOF. 3D: 1-3=xyz velocity, 4-6=xyz angular velocity. 2D: 1-2=xy velocity, 3=angular velocity.

methods.name: extra
methods.description: Get clump extra data in given slot.

methods.name: set_extra
methods.description: Set clump extra data in given slot.

methods.name: fragment
methods.description: Get clump fragment ID.

methods.name: set_fragment
methods.description: Set clump fragment ID.

methods.name: inside
methods.description: Test whether a point is inside this clump volume.
